content: कौतुकं [कुतुकस्य भावः अण्] {@--1@} Desire, curiosity, wish. {@--2@} Eagerness, vehemence, impatience. {@--3@} Anything creating curiosity or wonder. {@--4@} The marriage thread (worn on the wrist); करोयमामुक्तविवाहकौतुकः <ls>Ku. 5. 66</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 1.</ls> {@--5@} The ceremony with the marriage thread preceding a marriage. {@--6@} Festivity, gaiety. {@--7@} Particularly, auspicious festivity, solemn occasion (such as marriage); प्रस्थान° <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 25.</ls> {@--8@} Delight, joy, pleasure, happiness; <ls>Bh. 3. 140</ls>; °रसाः <ls>U. 6. 33</ls>; <ls>Māl. 10. 3</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 37.</ls> {@--9@} Sport, pastime. {@--10@} A song, dance, show or spectacle. {@--11@} Joke, mirth. {@--12@} Friendly greeting, salutation.
